text: RELATED : ‘ American Idol ’ Winner Fantasia Barrino Suffers Second - Degree Burns On Her Arm, Cancels Concert As she explains, “ I was so busy trying to take care of everybody else so busy looking for that love that I was ending up in all the wrong situations so I came here to do ‘ After Midnight ’, jazz … so that was a breath of fresh air for me, and so I said I ’ m going to marry myself. ” In addition, she tells Connick that she also tried to set aside all her other vices in order to figure out God ’ s plan for her.
